DiscrepancyNoteAction.Message: In order for the subject to be eligible, all Inclusion Criteria must be answered 'Yes' and all Exclusion Criteria must be answered 'No'. Please verify your response.
Date of Informed Consent does not match Date of Informed Consent provided on Demographics and/or the Verification of Informed Consent form. Please verify your response.
'Yes' was selected for Question 2 but Total Score on MMSE form is not between 12-27. Please verify your response.

RuleDef.Name: Inc/Exc: Verify Eligibility
RuleDef.Description: Subject is not eligible if any Inclusion criteria are 'No' or any Exclusion criteria are 'Yes'.
RuleDef.Expression: I_INCLU_INEX_ELIG eq 1 and (I_INCLU_EX_OGTT eq 1 or I_INCLU_EX_HEP eq 1 or I_INCLU_EX_CARD eq 1 or I_INCLU_EX_RECNT eq 1 or I_INCLU_EX_STRKE eq 1 or I_INCLU_EX_SEIZ eq 1 or I_INCLU_EX_MENTL eq 1 or I_INCLU_EX_ORAL eq 1 or I_INCLU_EX_INS eq 1 or I_INCLU_EX_DRUG eq 1 or I_INCLU_IN_NINCDS eq 2 or I_INCLU_IN_MMSE eq 2 or I_INCLU_IN_NMDA eq 2 or I_INCLU_IN_HOME eq 2 or I_INCLU_IN_CARE eq 2 or I_INCLU_IN_ENGSP eq 2 or I_INCLU_IN_STBL eq 2 or I_INCLU_IN_DOSE eq 2 or I_INCLU_IN_HEPIN eq 2 or I_INCLU_IN_ORAL eq 2 or I_INCLU_IN_IC eq 2)

RuleDef.Name: Inc/Exc: Verify DT Inf Cons. with Demographics and Verification of IC form
RuleDef.Description: Date of Informed Consent should match Date of Informed Consent on Demographics form.

RuleDef.Name: Inc/Exc: Verify MMSE Score
RuleDef.Description: MMSE score inclusion criteria should match total score on MMSE form.
RuleDef.Expression: I_INCLU_IN_MMSE eq 1 and (SE_ENROLLMENT.F_MINIMENTALST.IG_MINIM_MMSE.I_MINIM_MM_SCORE gt 27 or F_MINIMENTALST.IG_MINIM_MMSE.I_MINIM_MM_SCORE lt 12)
